solution_line_template: With her regular shoes, it should take {miles}*{old_shoe_mile_time}=<<{miles}*{old_shoe_mile_time}={old_shoe_total_time}>>{old_shoe_total_time} minutes to run five miles
If she wore her new shoes it would take {new_shoe_mile_time}*{miles}=<<{new_shoe_mile_time}*{miles}={new_shoe_total_time}>>{new_shoe_total_time} minutes to run five miles
